proof command that aids in simple proofs of equality.
 \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Ltac} \coqdocvar{equal} := \coqdocvar{autounfold} \coqdockw{with} \coqdocvar{unfoldEq}; \coqdoctac{repeat} \coqdocvar{decide} \coqdocvar{equality}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}


Handy Ltac  for simplifying Hypothesis' since simpl doesn't do it.
Note: it will fail if the hypothesis doesn't change.
\begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Ltac} \coqdocvar{simpl\_H} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{0.50em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdockw{goal} \coqdockw{with} \coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
[ \coqdocvar{H} : ?\coqdocvar{T} \ensuremath{\vdash} \coqdocvar{\_}] \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdoctac{progress} (\coqdocvar{autounfold} \coqdoctac{in} \coqdocvar{H}; (\coqdoctac{simpl} \coqdoctac{in} \coqdocvar{H}))\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Ltac} \coqdocvar{cbn\_H} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{0.50em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdockw{goal} \coqdockw{with} \coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
[ \coqdocvar{H} : ?\coqdocvar{T} \ensuremath{\vdash} \coqdocvar{\_}] \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdoctac{progress} (\coqdocvar{autounfold} \coqdockw{with} \ensuremath{\times} \coqdoctac{in} \coqdocvar{H} ; (\coqdocvar{cbn} \coqdoctac{in} \coqdocvar{H}))\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}


The actual command to use in proofs.
will continue to apply until it fails. 
\begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Tactic Notation} "sh" := \coqdoctac{repeat} \coqdocvar{simpl\_H}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Tactic Notation} "simplAll" := \coqdocvar{sh}; \coqdocvar{autounfold}; \coqdoctac{simpl}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Tactic Notation} "refl" := \coqdoctac{reflexivity}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Ltac} \coqdocvar{inversion\_any'} := \coqdockw{match} \coqdockw{goal} \coqdockw{with} \coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
[\coqdocvar{H} : ?\coqdocvar{x} \coqexternalref{:type scope:x '=' x}{http://coq.inria.fr/distrib/8.6/stdlib/Coq.Init.Logic}{\coqdocnotation{=}} ?\coqdocvar{y} \ensuremath{\vdash} \coqdocvar{\_}] \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdoctac{progress} ( \coqdoctac{inversion} \coqdocvar{H})\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Ltac} \coqdocvar{inversion\_any} := \coqdoctac{solve} [(\coqdoctac{repeat} \coqdocvar{inversion\_any'})].\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocindent{0.50em}
\end{coqdoccode}
